messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: REPORT: 567-2131-C DATE: 8/12/23  In the morning hours of aUgust 11, OfFicEr W. X. Grayson was notified about an alleged theft at 7689 Pine Avenue. Witnesses Mr. Sanders, a bank clerk, and Ms. Turner, a cafe owner, reported the event. SEND TO: Patrol DiV1S1ON. CITIZEN REPORTS. Lt. J. K. Mitchell - PATROLS.  Upon reaching the location by 10:15 AM, Officer Grayson was met with a chaotic scene. Security alarms were sounding, and DeTECTive Y. Z. Fernandez was already present, collecting preliminary statements. REPORT FOR: Lt. MITCHELL, PATROLS.  Sanders explained that he saw a masked individual fleeing with a bag, which he believed contained money. Turner noted a getaway vehicle, a red sedan. Detective A. B. Conrad was tasked with reviewing surveillance footage.  Evidence gathered by TechniCian Maria and Technician James suggested forced entry into the bank. CONTINUE TO: ForeNSic DIVIS1ON. EVIDENCE FILES. This included a crowbar, gloves, and shoe prints. Reports sent to Captain G. H. Lewis for assessment.  By noon, Detective Conrad and Detective I. J. Watson, with guidance from Lieutenant Mitchell, had identified a suspect and an address. Sergeant L. M. Nolan organized a search warrant. The suspect, name withheld, was apprehended by evening.  FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVIS1ON 3 - STATUS [CHECK THREE] Officer Grayson, Detective Fernandez, Detective Conrad, Technician Maria, Technician James, Captain Lewis, Lieutenant Mitchell, Sergeant Nolan, Detective Watson  INVESTIGATION DOCUMENTS:  CCTV Footage Forensic Reports Bank Statements Audio Clips Incident Summaries (6) Arrest Record CONTACT COMMANDER IN CHARGE F. Davidson L.C.P.D. 567-410 R3E 2135 Sanders, ALAN ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 312-7589 OFFICER: W. X. GRAYSON ITEM: 99-7500- 305 CRIME: 10:15 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 12345 - PROCESSED Jane Smith DATE 8/13/23 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Officer W. X. Grayson  
Officer Context: In the morning hours of August 11, Officer W. X. Grayson was notified about an alleged theft at 7689 Pine Avenue.  
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Lt. J. K. Mitchell  
Officer Context: SEND TO: Patrol Division. CITIZEN REPORTS. Lt. J. K. Mitchell - PATROLS.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant 

Officer Name: Detective Y. Z. Fernandez  
Officer Context: Security alarms were sounding, and Detective Y. Z. Fernandez was already present, collecting preliminary statements.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective A. B. Conrad  
Officer Context: Detective A. B. Conrad was tasked with reviewing surveillance footage.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Technician Maria  
Officer Context: Evidence gathered by Technician Maria and Technician James suggested forced entry into the bank.  
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Technician James  
Officer Context: Evidence gathered by Technician Maria and Technician James suggested forced entry into the bank.  
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Captain G. H. Lewis  
Officer Context: Reports sent to Captain G. H. Lewis for assessment.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Watson  
Officer Context: By noon, Detective Conrad and Detective I. J. Watson, with guidance from Lieutenant Mitchell, had identified a suspect and an address.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Sergeant L. M. Nolan  
Officer Context: Sergeant L. M. Nolan organized a search warrant.  
Officer Role: Sergeant
